meanings: (모양을) (장식하다) decorate[adorn] (sth with sth), (주로 수동태로 쓰여) ornament, deck out, (얼굴을) make up
(이야기 등을) invent, fabricate, concoct, manufacture, make up, come up with

vlive.korean: 뺄 때 어떻게 해? - 자 여러분들 잘 꾸미고 있죠? How do you take it out then? - Are you decorating? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: How do you take it out then? - Are you decorating?

vlive.korean: 뺄 때 힘들잖아 - 이렇게 해야지 이제 열었을 때 이게 나오면서 - 여러분들 잘 꾸미고 있죠? It's difficult to take it out. - So when you open this, this will come out. - Are you decorating? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: It's difficult to take it out. - So when you open this, this will come out. - Are you decorating?

vlive.korean: 혹시 어떻게 꾸미고 싶으신가요? how do you want to decorate it? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] KIM WOO SEOK X LieV - 김우석의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: how do you want to decorate it?

vlive.korean: 그냥 이거 꾸미고 끝낼까요? Should I finish after decorating this? 듣기 View video CIX : 서기의 깜짝라이브😛
vlive.english: Should I finish after decorating this?

vlive.korean: 맞아, 트리 꾸미고 있었는데 같이 꾸밀까요? I was decorating the tree. Will you join me? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 메리 영민스마스🎅🎅❤
vlive.english: I was decorating the tree. Will you join me?

examples.korean: Images of deer and hunters decorate the cave walls. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사슴과 사냥꾼들을 그린 그림이 그 동굴 벽을 꾸미고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Images of deer and hunters decorate the cave walls. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His colleagues, meanwhile, were busily scheming to get rid of him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한편 그의 동료들은 부지런히 그를 제거할 책략을 꾸미고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His colleagues, meanwhile, were busily scheming to get rid of him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They went to all the expense of redecorating the house and then they moved. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 돈을 다 들여 집을 다시 꾸미고는 이사를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They went to all the expense of redecorating the house and then they moved. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She seemed to feel that we were all scheming against her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 우리 모두가 자기에게 불리한 책략을 꾸미고 있다고 여기는 모양이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She seemed to feel that we were all scheming against her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He thought she was play-acting but in fact she had really hurt herself. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그녀가 거짓으로 꾸미고 있다고 생각했지만 사실은 그녀가 진짜 자해를 했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He thought she was play-acting but in fact she had really hurt herself. Add to Wordbook
